title: Jindivik: the hunted one
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Aerial observation (Military science)

Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Airplanes - Design and construction
description: The Jindivik is the remote-control target aircraft designed and built at the Government Aircraft Factory in Melbourne. The design has been upgraded during its 20 years of existence, and the latest version can be used to test guided missiles in a variety of target situations. Cinematogrpahy by Russell Boyd.
